full_text:
Interesting Mike. Frank spoke about making a copper box because they mentioned it. I kept saying reminds me of a faraday cage. Also interesting when you shut the door and its on AM at 1:54 in the video I hear "Your ghostbox box". I hear a little more after that but thats what I hear clearest LOL

A box for your box. LOL at least you didnt press the on button.

Misty

> frequencies

> frequency was
